message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $9000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Let me know if you're open to that.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $7500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $8200 for the product. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $8200 is still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable paying. I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $8000. This is my final offer.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $8500. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
